data.title: FRAG/MENT Elbow Lineup From B Long
data.description: Here's a simple, but powerful lineup you can use to prevent Defenders playing at Elbow from successfully fast retaking the B Site.

data.title: Hookah ZERO/POINT From Close B Short
data.description: This is a simple, but effective ZERO/POINT to clear out / suppress the entirety of Hookah.

data.title: ZERO/POINT To Check For Fake A Teleport
data.description: This ZERO/POINT is useful for checking whether or not an enemy player has faked a teleport through the A Teleporter.

data.title: B Garden / B Long Op Angle FRAG/MENT From B Fountain
data.description: This quick and easy FRAG/MENT makes it more difficult for players to hold top B Long from the op angle on the right side of the top of B Long.

data.title: A Bath ZERO/POINT From Attacker Spawn
data.description: This ZERO/POINT lineup is useful for both suppressing and gathering information on players in A Bath with low risk of the ZERO/POINT being destroyed. The travel time of the ZERO/POINT is high, but when timed well it can make it more difficult for the Defender to hold A Bath.
